channel.title: SSL on Witton的博客
channel.description: Recent content in SSL on Witton的博客

item.title: 解决：pip is configured with locations that require TLS
item.description: 在使用pip进行软件包安装的时候出现问题： 1WARNING: pip is configured with locations that require TLS/SSL, however the ssl module in Python is not available. 解决： 1make -p ~/.pip 2vim ~/.pip/pip.conf 然后输入内容： 1[global] 2index-url = http://mirrors.aliyun.com/pypi/simple/ 3 4[install]
